Functions
runTurnAfterNormCollState

The purpose of the function is to represent a state where allows controller to turn the robot sideways as well as being able to stop it and then inform it that it completed a turn successfully.  This functions gets activated when the zumo hits a wall and discovers that there's a corridor and then moves back and stops allowing the controller to turn it.

_decideUponCollisionForTurnAfterNormCollState

Decides on where to move zumo based on the collision
